about_the_game:
In the world of Lumin, dragons are far from mere legends—they are dangerous creatures that can become invaluable allies. As you face other dragons, you can also choose to tame and add them to your collection of mighty companions.


Hunt and subdue ancient dragons to rule the skies. Dragons' abilities vary according to their sizes and breed. You can create different combat strategies by taming new dragons, as each dragon comes with its own advantages and challenges.

Your dragon is your companion not only among the clouds but also on the land. Even when airborne, you can dismount whenever you want and engage in ground combat, while ordering your dragon to burn your enemies from the skies.

Drair are revered warriors, who can conjure powerful spells and control dragons. Enrich your melee fighting skills with the spells you learn in your adventures. Combine different weapons, firearms, dragon skills and spells to come up with your unique combat style.


Filled with political intrigue, power struggles, and mythical creatures, the world of Lumin is brutal and complex. Cultists, nobles, merchants, and even commoners are constantly fighting and scheming to expand their influence, gain more power, and grow richer.
You can shape your journey through choices that will influence your character’s path and impact the world around you.



Lumin’s world is filled with floating islands, flying galleons, hidden locations and diverse landscapes that offer vast exploration and adventure possibilities.

Join the early access phase and be among the first to explore Sagas of Lumin. The game will launch with plenty of content to keep players entertained. Future updates will include more levels, a larger world, additional storylines and new features like political decisions. Your feedback will be crucial in shaping the future of Sagas of Lumin.

content_descriptors.notes: Sagas of Lumin features intense battles and warfare. Combat includes the use of swords, axes, and other melee weapons, as well as firearms. Blood is visible during these encounters, but no dismemberment occurs. Additionally, there are scenes that, while not showing nudity, suggest sexual themes through dialogue and body language, such as light erotic dance moves and self-caressing over clothing.
